resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

vulnerable.note: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mordakhesh's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). Mordakhesh can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Mordakhesh can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. Mordakhesh has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage.

action.name: Chromatic Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@dice 3d8}) damage of a type chosen by Mordakhesh: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Mordakhesh makes one weapon attack or casts {@spell chromatic orb}.

legendary.name: Chromatic Resistance
entries: Modakhesh gains resistance to one damage type of his choice—acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder—until the start of his next turn.

legendary.name: Warlord's Command (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Mordakhesh targets up to two allies that he can see within 30 feet of him. If a target can see and hear him, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.
